list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of lines, planes, surfaces, or objects) side by side and having the same distance continuously between them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đường song song không bao giờ gặp nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or thing that is similar or analogous to another.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a challenge that has no parallel in peacetime this century
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một thách thức không có song song trong thời bình thời gian này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the imaginary parallel circles of constant latitude on the earth's surface.
two parallel lines (‖) as a reference mark.
(of something extending in a line) be side by side with (something extending in a line), always keeping the same distance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a big concrete gutter that paralleled the road
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một máng xối bê tông lớn song song với con đường
